title: Replace with official LG logo and apply comprehensive LG brand theme

requirements.text: Replace the current SVG-based LG logo in the Header component with the official LG Electronics logo image asset, maintaining the existing header layout and structure

quotes: This is not proper lg logo please add proper logo

acceptanceCriteria: Official LG logo image is displayed in the header
Logo maintains proper aspect ratio and visual quality

requirements.text: Apply comprehensive LG brand theme across all page sections including hero section, appliance category cards, service features, service request form, FAQ accordion, and contact information sections
acceptanceCriteria: All sections use consistent LG Heritage Red (#A50034) accent color
Typography follows LG brand guidelines with clean, modern sans-serif styling
Component styling (cards, buttons, forms, accordions) reflects LG brand aesthetics
Color scheme uses LG red for primary actions and accents while maintaining readability
Visual hierarchy and spacing follow professional LG design patterns

requirements.text: Update background colors, border treatments, and card designs across ServiceCenterPage to align with LG brand identity using subtle grays and whites with LG red accents
acceptanceCriteria: Page background uses clean white or light gray tones
Card components have subtle shadows and borders consistent with LG design
Section dividers and spacing create professional, organized layout
Interactive elements (buttons, form inputs, accordions) use LG red for hover and active states

requirements.text: Ensure all icons, badges, and graphical elements throughout the page complement the LG brand aesthetic with appropriate sizing, spacing, and color treatments
acceptanceCriteria: Appliance category icons are styled consistently with LG brand
Service feature icons use appropriate colors and sizing
Form icons and validation indicators follow LG brand patterns
All iconography maintains visual consistency across sections

constraints: Maintain existing header layout structure from Header component
Preserve all functional components including service request form, contact form, FAQ accordion, and appliance category grid
Do not modify backend/main.mo or any backend logic
Do not edit immutable paths: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui
nonGoals: Changing the functional behavior of forms or data submission
Modifying backend data models or API endpoints
Adding new features or functionality beyond visual branding
Changing the overall page structure or component hierarchy

required: Official LG Electronics logo with red circle and white 'LG' text on transparent background, optimized for web header display (lg-logo.dim_180x60.png)
